item.description:
==========================

Please join us for a 2012 RED SOX NATIVES EXCLUSIVE EVENT!

Join us at Game On! for a Marathon Patriots and Sports Game Viewing Party to watch the New England Patriots take on the Seattle Seahawks on Sunday, October 14.

Come early at 1:00pm to get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing for the 1:00pm games.

Patriots Game Time is 4:05pm.

Game On! Employee and Red Sox Native Sonja has kindly arranged for us to have 2 sky box sections on the lower level to watch any games at 1:00pm, followed by the Patriots game at 4:00pm. Sonja will be providing some complimentary appetizers at half time of the 1:00pm games and before the Patriots game. We will have our own server. The full menu will be available for food orders.

We may have free access to the Fenway Batting cages too!

There is no event fee for our reserved section.

Stay for the whole game or leave when ever.

ALSO Watch one of the MLB Playoff Games too!

We will be inviting some guests. Check back for updates.

The Red Sox Natives organized weekly Patriots viewing parties last year with guests from several other invited groups attending. We had a blast with up to 80 people attending at various locations in Boston, Woburn and Wakefield.

Game On! is one of our venues for New England Patriots games, Red Sox and other sportis events. 

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO AND TIP YOUR SERVER.

Space is limited.

We hope to see you there.

Red Sox Natives Team
item.how_to_find_us: Game On has reserved a large section for us. Ask the hostess to direct you to The Red Sox Natives section.
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party Marathon at Game On! - Patriots at Seahawks and More
